archaist.message: Archaist is your aspie friend. That's comes in hand since she likes arcaic words. A child asked: Why do you speak so funny? She answered: You are the one whom speak so funny! Contrary to expectations, she is a teenager, too.§
hi, hellen, are you here? I miss you.§

choices.title: Hey, can I help you? Are you fine?§
I’m here, darling, what can I do for you? c:§

result1.message: oh, sorry I don’t want to bother.§
You aren’t bothering. To be honest chatting will made me better, specially with a dearest friend. Wanna talk about what happened to you?§
